title.narrative: World Vision / Local Ecosystem Development for Sustainable Tourism

description.narrative: The purpose of the project is to build a shareholder network and a co-creation platform for developing sustainable tourism in the Eastern Province of Sri Lanka starting from Passikudah. Eventually the project will contribute to the economic development of the area. Through the platform local communities are linked to new shareholders and capacities including Finnish companies that wish to participate in the local development. Local knowledge of WV Lanka together with Finnish technologies and competences can build the local communities and generate income from tourism. The main target groups here are female-headed households people with disabilities and unemployed youth. World Vision?s Weconomy Start innovation program will work here as a platform bringing Fi nnish companies to Sri Lankan BOP-markets. The total budget will be 79000 euros and total duration of the project 15 years. The partners of the project are Trawise Ltd and Aalto University.
